Invocation Name: advanced concepts
des: You can use Advanced Concepts to ask questions about the business and get verified answers. Advanced Concepts is a construction company located in Littleton CO. After the Welcome message, you can ask questions like What's is your phone number, What's your address, tell me more about the business.
